General.Name: Shijiazhuang Yiling Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Shijiazhuang Yiling Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of Chinese medicine primarily in China. It offers drugs for respiratory health, cardiovascular disease, diabetes mellitus, oncology, urologic disease, sleep-improving, and anti-aging. The company also provides dietary supplements, health food and drinks, disinfection products, and personal protective equipment, as well as formula granules. Shijiazhuang Yiling Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Shijiazhuang, China.
